entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:45 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:45 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 5:45 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023
